abstract: With the housing market in the doldrums and inflation running at a pace unseen in nearly two decades, consumers are not buying new homes. Instead they are focusing on repairs.
snippet: With the housing market in the doldrums and inflation running at a pace unseen in nearly two decades, consumers are not buying new homes. Instead they are focusing on repairs.
lead_paragraph: Suddenly, the theme in home goods retailing is “in with the old.”

headline.main: Home Repairs Become Focus as Consumers Feel Pinched
headline.print_headline: Home Repairs Become Focus As Consumers Feel Pinched
